##  Installation ðŸš€

### Via PyPI (Recommended)
```sh
pip install Pycodz -U
```

## ðŸš€ Quick Start

```python
import Pycodz.ai as z44o
bot = z44o.PHIND()
request = input(" - Type Your request : ")
response = bot.chat(
    prompt = request
)
print(response)
```

- [x] [Python 3](https://python.org)
